page.title: 13Housing in Littleton
page.content: Littleton-on-Severn is a sleepy little village. The buildings are a mixture of the old and new. As you enter the village from Aust you come across an old school building which is no longer in use. There are many fine old detatched houses, a number of which have been renovated and modernised. As we walked up a lane we came to duck pond and in front of us there was a very imposing building which looked like an old mansion house. Some of the houses have thatched roofs but there are also some much newer buildings-bungalows and semi-detatched houses. There are also some farm houses in the centre and on the outskirts of the village.
